message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"to get sick; to be ill","sentence":"他生病。","image_prompt":"A young man sits on a bed in a simple room, holding his head and looking tired, a thermometer in his mouth. The setting is cozy and modern, with a clock showing daytime, a glass of water on a bedside table, and a soft apocalypse animation style: gentle pastel colors, faint glowing outlines, and subtle surreal background details like soft crumbling walls and faded sunlight.","sentence_translation":"He is sick."}
